member_organisations: We do not have members as such.
fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Engagement on Intellectual Property (IP) Awareness and Management, IP Legislation, IP Counterfeiting and Piracy, Cybersecurity and Anti-Corruption issues.
organisation_name: Center for Responsible Enterprise And Trade (CREATe.org)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We are members of or work closely with the following groups: IPO,  Conference Board, Ethisphere, UNIFAB, INTA, International Chamber of Commerce (ICC), ICC- Germany, ICC-Mexico, IACCM, LES and academic institutions
goals__remit: CREATe.org is a non profit organization founded in 2011 to help companies and supply chain members mitigate the risks of counterfeiting, piracy, trade secret theft, cybersecurity breaches, and corruption by improving management system processes and practices.
